page.title: 10FARMING IN ALVA
page.content: Farming is an important{occupation}in Alva. There are 4 farms,Rhodders and Burnside at the foot of the Ochils,and Greenhead and the Boll farm which have land near the River Devon. Crops such as hay,barley,wheat,turnip and potatoes are grown and the area is also well known for sheep farming. The Boll farm has a farm shop which sells fresh vegetables,fruit and eggs. A track-way has been made on the Nebit by the Rhodders farm to give better access for the farmer to check up on his{sheep,}whereas before he had to struggle in a land-rover over rough ground up and down the{hills.}
